amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund relating to addressing the crisis of climate change.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3330 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 317.

action.text: Amendment SA 3330 proposed by Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S6208; text: CR S6208) To establish a reserve fund relating to addressing the crisis of climate change.
